comment: This class was my most stressful class of the semester. 5-10 page essays several group projects and in-class presentation(s), on top of managing weekly essays and discussion posts every other week. This class was a lot, on top of managing other classes. He's not a bad professor, just wouldn't take again or recommend due to the workload.
rating_tags: Group projects--Lots of homework--So many papers

comment: He is a great guy that really cares for his students. Took him in my first semester of freshman year and the class was fairly easy. No quizzes or tests just A lot of writing assignments but if you give some effort, you'll be fine. The group projects are not very difficult, and he takes attendance however I missed many days and still got an A.

The professor was decent, the actual class content is hard part. The only issue I had was he would forget to remind us about assignments due on D2L so I missed 6 assignments in total because I didn't know they existed.  Though he did allow students to make up late work.

This class isn't very difficult. He does lecture a lot though but no quizzes. There are weekly discussion/reflection papers due, but the reflections only have to be a page long. He isn't a tough grader either. Make effort on the writing assignments and you'll get a good grade. There are 3 projects in this class but 2 of them are group projects.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--So many papers
